page.title: 07LEVEN VALLEY COMMUTERS
page.content: WE SENT QUESTIONNAIRES TO 5 PEOPLE IN OUR AREA,WHO COMMUTED,ASKING WHY THEY MOVED,WHERE THEY WORKED,etc. THEY ALL WORK IN FIFE-MOST IN GLENROTHES.THEY TRAVEL ALONE,BY CAR. ______________________________________ WORK AREA JOB WHY THEY MOVED Glenrothes Company To live in the Director country. Buckhaven Teacher Got married. Glenrothes Electrical Larger family Engineer Near airport Glenrothes Technician To live in the country Retired _ To live in the country ______________________________________
